item.title: How I change the loading bar?
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

method13

Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(c / 2 - 152, 304, 34, 0x8c1111, j, true); //Border Colour 0x8c1111 Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(c / 2 - 151, 302, 32, 0, j + 1, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(30, j + 2, c / 2 - 150, 0x8c1111, i * 3, 0); // Loaded Colour 0x8c1111 Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(30, j + 2, (c / 2 - 150) + i * 3, 0, 300 - i * 3, 0); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method381(0xffffff, s, 23693, (c1 / 2 + 5) - byte1, c / 2); // Background Colour 0xffffff

The colours set there are Jagex’s default colours for the loading bar as you requested.
